text: Mirkka Elina Rekola (26 June 1931 - 5 February 2014) was a Finnish writer from Tampere. She published poems, aphorisms and essays. Her poetry was called "difficult".Helena Darnell, Mirkka Rekola. Many people read her work as late as in the 1990s. She was awarded many times.About the writer at Books from Finland. A Literary Journal. Rekola died on 5 February 2014 in Helsinki.
